name: Selection Variants
description:
See and control all nested variants instances in selection. Switch between variants without clicking through to find all the nested ones. Reduce the complexity of your design system by creating nested variants! Or simply use the to switch variants in bulk by selecting multiple objects — useful when working with lists or tables.


Open design file: https://figma.fun/uxf00U — feel free to add your ideas!


Want this feature in Figma natively? Vote for this suggestion: https://forum.figma.com/t/nested-variant-component-override-controls/673
